author: Andrew C. Hsiu & Huy Nguyễn
notes: For comparative purposes regarding the Austric hypothesis. (Vietnamese is an Austro-Asiatic language like Khmer.)Corrections made on 09/13/2010 by Huy Nguyễn on multiple items.
problems: Words are entered in their original \quốc ngữ\" orthography. Most browsers should be able to display Vietnamese characters. Transcribing Vietnamese into IPA or another system is particularly problematic
typedby: etc. Many people will probably find that using the original orthography would be more helpful."
column13: @misc{Nguyen-666-2010,  author = \Andrew C. Hsiu and Huy Huy Nguyễn\"

author: sharp

author: to throw
glottocode: to throw something light, usually away

author: to throw
glottocode: to throw something heavy, usually away

author: to throw
glottocode: to throw a knife or launch an attack/plane
